steps.name: Generate Calculator Class
steps.prompt: Create a Python calculator class with add, subtract, multiply, and divide methods. Include proper error handling for division by zero.

steps.name: Add Unit Tests
steps.prompt:
Write comprehensive unit tests for this calculator class using pytest. Test all methods including edge cases:

{context from previous step}

steps.name: Create Requirements File
steps.prompt:
